title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 703.5 - Location and hours
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 703.5 - Location and hours

State Regulations
(a) Records shall be made available at the main office of the department, which is
located at: Building 12, State Campus

Albany, NY 12240
(b) Whenever practicable, records shall be
made available at a regional department office most convenient to a data
subject. Department regional offices are located throughout the State in

Albany, Buffalo, Binghamton, Syracuse, Rochester, White Plains, New York City, Utica and Hempstead. (c) Hours for
public inspection and copying. The department shall accept requests for records
and produce records during regular hours, which are from 9 a.m. to 5
p.m. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
703.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
